headline: CHATILLON DIGITAL FORCE GAUGE
categories.lvl1: Material / Physical Testing Equipment > Tensile and Compression
categories.lvl2: Material / Physical Testing Equipment  >  Tensile and Compression > Other Tensile & Compression
specstable:
Manufacturer Chatillon
Model DFGHS50
Description Force Gauge, Digtial
Accessories Printer cable and power supply included.
Other Information Capacity x Graduation
  • 50 lb x .02 lb
  • 25 kg x .01 kg
  • 250 N x .1 N
  • Accuracy: ±0.15% of full scale
  • Tare capacity: 10% of full scale in pound or ounce mode
  • Analog output: 0 to ±2 VDC full scale
  • Full scale deflection: 0.010"
  • Temperature range: 40°F to 110°F
  • Stability 0.03% per °F
Condition Very Good
